.
Obtaining Additional Signatures for Rating Decisions in VBMS-R
Submit all draft rating decisions requiring additional signatures via the DRA functionality within VBMS-R.
Important
:  A rating decision should not be finalized until all necessary second and third signatures have been obtained.
Reference
:  For more information on submitting a draft rating decision for additional signatures, see the
DRA Job Aid
.
